faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about custom furniture design.

1.question: Is the furniture design app free to use?
1.answer: Yes, the basic version of Meble 3D is completely free. You can design custom furniture, generate cut lists, and export projects at no cost.

2.question: How much can I save by designing furniture myself?
2.answer: By designing furniture yourself and ordering boards directly from the warehouse, you can save up to 50% compared to ordering from a carpenter. You eliminate middleman margins and only pay for materials and cutting.

3.question: How does the cut list export work?
3.answer: The app generates a cut list in CSV format, which is accepted by most furniture board warehouses. Simply download the file and send it to your chosen warehouse, which will prepare pre-cut elements ready for assembly.

4.question: Do I need furniture design experience?
4.answer: No, the app is intuitive and designed for both beginners and professionals. We offer ready-made wardrobe and furniture templates that you can customize to your dimensions. The 3D visualization lets you see the final result before ordering.

howItWorks.title: How does the 3D furniture designer work?

1.title: Choose furniture type
1.description: Wardrobe, cabinet, shelf or alcove unit? Choose from ready templates or start from scratch.

2.title: Adjust dimensions
2.description: Enter exact dimensions tailored to your space. Everything updates in real-time.

3.title: Choose materials
3.description: Board type, color, thickness, edge finish – you have full control over the look.

4.title: Download cut list
4.description: Generate a CSV file ready to send to the warehouse. Order pre-cut elements and assemble yourself.

whatYouCanDesign.title: What can you design online?
whatYouCanDesign.description: Our 3D designer supports various types of cabinet furniture – from simple shelves to elaborate built-in wardrobes.

wardrobes.title: Built-in and freestanding wardrobes
wardrobes.description: Design wardrobes with dividers, drawers and shelves. Perfect for bedroom and hallway.

cabinets.title: Cabinets and shelves
cabinets.description: Furniture for living room, office and kids room. Any configuration of shelves and dividers.

kitchen.title: Kitchen furniture
kitchen.description: Base and wall cabinets, cargo, drawers. Export dimensions to any warehouse.

savings.title: Save up to 50%
savings.description: Eliminate carpenter and middleman margins. You only pay for materials and cutting.

control.title: Full control over the project

noMiddlemen.title: No middlemen
noMiddlemen.description: Order boards directly from warehouse. Same quality as professionals use.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about online design

1.question: Is online furniture design really free?
1.answer: Yes, the 3D designer is completely free. You can create unlimited projects, export cut lists and save projects at no cost.

2.question: How do I order boards for my project?
2.answer: After designing furniture, you export the cut list in CSV format. You send this file to your chosen furniture board warehouse, which will prepare pre-cut elements for pickup or delivery.

3.question: Do I need design experience?
3.answer: No, the app is intuitive. We offer ready furniture templates that you can easily customize to your dimensions. 3D visualization shows the result in real-time.

4.question: How long does it take to design furniture online?
4.answer: A simple piece of furniture takes 5-10 minutes. A more elaborate built-in wardrobe with many dividers may take 30-60 minutes. You can save your project and continue later.

relatedArticles.title: Related guides
relatedArticles.description: Learn more about designing and ordering custom furniture.

hero.title: Order furniture online – how to buy custom furniture?
hero.description: From 3D design through quote to board delivery. Learn how to save on furniture without a carpenter by ordering materials directly from the warehouse.

1.title: Create a design
1.description: Design furniture in the free 3D designer. Customize dimensions and materials to your needs.

2.title: Export cut list
2.description: Download a CSV file with a list of all elements and their dimensions.

3.title: Send to warehouse
3.description: Send the list to your chosen furniture board warehouse. You'll receive a quote and delivery date.

4.title: Pick up and assemble
4.description: Pick up pre-cut elements and assemble furniture yourself or with a fitter.

pricing.title: How much does online furniture ordering cost?
pricing.description: Cost depends on chosen material, furniture size and warehouse. On average you save 40-60% compared to ordering from a carpenter.

1.question: Where can I order furniture boards?
1.answer: You can send the cut list to any furniture board warehouse. Most accept CSV format and offer home delivery.

2.question: Does the warehouse apply edge banding?
2.answer: Yes, the app also generates an edge banding list. The warehouse will apply edge banding to specified edges according to your design.

3.question: How long does order fulfillment take?
3.answer: Typically 5-10 business days, depending on the warehouse and material availability. Some offer express 2-3 day fulfillment.

4.question: Can I order with home delivery?
4.answer: Yes, most warehouses offer delivery. Cost depends on distance and order weight. You can also pick up in person.

relatedArticles.title: Related guides
